document_data.name: Gaurdront's Guide to Monstrous Beasts
document_data.author: [[Gaurdront]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Gaurdront's Guide to Monstrous Beasts''''' was a popular reference book describing monsters of [[Faer√ªn]]. It was cataloged by monster expert [[Gaurdront]]. Several copies of the guidebook were available to view for free within the open book galleries of the [[Vault of the Sages]] in [[Silverymoon]].
